CustomField.description: This field has been DEPRECATED. Please use the Split/Fee Object on the Campaign Partner instead. The split / fee percentage agreed to with the Partner for this Campaign. This value will be stamped on Intake when the Intake is assigned to a Campaign Partner record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field has been DEPRECATED. Please use the Split/Fee Object on the Campaign Partner instead. The split / fee percentage agreed to with the Partner for this Campaign. This value will be stamped on Intake when the Intake is assigned to a Campaign Partner record.
CustomField.label: Split / Fee Percentage
